Committee: Commerce, Economic Development And Small Business

Milestones.Committee: Commerce, Economic Development And Small Business

Actions.Text: REFERRED TO COMMERCE, ECONOMIC DEVELOPMENT AND SMALL BUSINESS

Title: Relates to the economic transformation and facility redevelopment program
Summary: Extends the economic transformation and facility redevelopment program and expands the program by including more correctional facility closures.
LawCode: Amd §§400 & 402, Ec Dev L; amd §35, Tax L; amd Part V §12, Chap 61 of 2011
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the economic development law, the tax law and chapter 61 of the laws of 2011, amending the economic development law, the tax law and the real property tax law relating to establishing the economic transformation and facility redevelopment program and providing tax benefits under that program, in relation to the economic transformation and facility redevelopment program and the effectiveness thereof
